Text:
According to Wikipedia "Frank's Big Shot" and "NASCAR Challenge" are episodes from 2nd season.

Anyone checked the other episodes?

There are only twelve episodes in the third season. All the releases i have seen have been way off as far as the numbering of episodes in their respective seasons. I got them all but had to go to the HC website and sort through everything as to have every episode in the right order.

Looks like the original uploader vanished. I've been downloading single episode torrents and then added them to this torrent.

It would be nice if someone else downloaded episodes 8 to 15 and added them here. I've got kind of slow internet so it might take a while for me...
@lobo345, done. Seasons 1 - 3 complete and in order.
